entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning near noon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
